ygData.subject: Re: Help with Tax Quest in Qeuynos
ygData.msgSnippet: talk to him and accuse him of stealing the money.. he ll make you say something like I m a gnoll loving weakling who isn t fit to kiss your feet or something
ygData.messageBody:
talk to him and accuse him of stealing the money.. he'll make you say something
like "I'm a gnoll loving weakling who isn't fit to kiss your feet" or something
like that =)

Trilin
Everworld
